name: 90 Seconds (Stikkz)
description:
A physics based game prototype made in 6 hours for the Game In Six game jam.

Control the Bee Bi Ate roller droid to get to the finish before the timer runs out.

Must use a controller

Left trigger - move left
Right trigger - move left
X - boost right
B - boost left
A - Jump
Y - Respawn at last restart point
